name: Rain Dish
summary: The user recovers 1/16 of their maximum HP when the weather is rainy.
viability: Rain Dish isn't as useful before, due to the elimination of permanent weather; however, for a few turns getting back 1/8 of HP (with Leftovers being the other half) can really help a wall out. Ludicolo, especially, can really recover HP with Leech Seed. Blastoise and Tentacruel can slowly take down the opponent with Toxic stalling while gaining back HP each turn.
